title: SolrJ SolrQuery.setFacet(false) does not add 'facet=false' to URL params
description:
The standard request handler is configured with

<bool name="facet">true</bool>


in the default section.

If I do not want to retrieve (and compute) facets for a specific query, I can add 'facet=false' to the list of URL parameters. But SolrJ's SolrQuery.setFacet(false) does not add this parameter.
